name: Boris BrightBeard
rules: Pay X, Flip Boris Brightbeard >>> Boris heals X damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Dizdemona
rules: Pay 3, Flip Dizdemona, Put X damage on her >>> Dizdemona deals X Shadow damage to target ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Elendril
rules: Pay 1, Flip Elendril >>> Your Ranged weapons have +3 ATK this turn.

name: Graccus

name: Litori Frostburn

name: Moonshadow
rules: Pay 3, Flip Moonshadow >>> Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.

name: Timmo Shadestep
rules: Pay 5, Flip Timmo Shadestep >>> Destroy target exhausted ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Warrax
rules: Pay 1, Flip Warrax >>> Warrax has protector this turn.

name: Gorebelly

name: Grennan Stormspeaker
rules: Pay 5, Flip Grennan Stormspeaker >>> Grennan deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally and heals 3 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Kayleitha
rules: Pay 2, Flip Kayleitha >>> While Kayleitha is stealthed, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to her this turn.

name: Omedus the Punisher
rules: Pay 3, Flip Omedus >>> Omedus deals Shadow damage to target hero equal to 7 minus the number of cards in its controller's hand.

name: Radak Doombringer
rules: Pay X, Flip Radak Doombringer, Destroy one of your Pets with cost X >>> Radak deals X Shadow damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Sen'Zir Beastwalker
rules: Pay 3, Flip Sen'zir Beastwalker >>> Put a Pet card from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Ta'zo
rules: Pay 3, Flip Ta'zo >>> Ta'zo deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Thangal
rules: Pay 3, Flip Thangal >>> Ready Thangal. Use only while he's in bear form.

name: Bash
rules:
Exhaust target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Bear Form
rules:
Ongoing: Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)
When Bear Form is destroyed, you may pay 2. If you do, put it into your hand at end of turn.

name: Circle of Life
rules: Ongoing: When an ally is destroyed, its controller may search his deck for an ally card with the same name and put it into play exhausted.

name: Entangling Roots
rules:
Attach to target ally and exhaust it.
Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.

name: Feral Rage
rules: Ongoing: When your hero is dealt combat damage while in bear form, you may pay 1. If you do, draw a card.

name: Healing Touch
rules: Your hero heals 10 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Innervate
rules: Target player draws three cards.

name: Mark of the Wild
rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK and +2 health.

name: Maul
rules:
Your hero has +1 ATK this turn.
Ongoing: Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Natural Defenses
rules: Ongoing: Each of your Armor has +1 DEF while your hero is in Bear form.

name: Natural Selection
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 3 Nature damage to target hero or ally or your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Nature's Swiftness
rules:
Restoration Hero Required
You pay 5 less to play your next card this turn.

name: Predatory Strikes
rules:
Feral Hero Required
Ongoing: While your hero is in bear form or cat form, it has +2 ATK while attacking.

Attach to target ally, and your hero heals 2 damage from it.
Ongoing: At the end of each turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached ally.

name: Starfire
rules:
Your hero deals 5 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
Draw a card.

Marksmanship Hero Required
Your hero deals X Ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Arcane Shot
rules:
Your hero deals 1 Arcane damage to target hero or ally.
Draw a card.

name: Aspect of the Hawk
rules: Ongoing: If your hero would deal Ranged damage, it deals that amount of damage plus 1 instead.

name: Beastial Wrath
rules:
Beast Mastery Hero Required
Target Pet has +3 ATK this turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

name: Eagle Eye
rules: Look at the top four cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Fury
rules: Ferocity

name: Marked for Death
rules:
Attach to target opposing hero or ally.
Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK while attacking attached character.

name: Multi-shot

rules: Old Bones can protect your hero.

name: Rapid Fire
rules: Whenever you strike with a Ranged weapon this turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready that weapon and your hero.

rules:
Target ally has +3 ATK this turn.
Target ally has -3 ATK this turn.

name: Rayder
rules: [Activate] >>> Allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Arcane Intellect

Attach to target hero, and its controller draws a card.
Ongoing: Attached hero's controller's maximum hand size is increased by three.

rules:
Draw a card.
If your hero is defending, remove all attackers from combat.

rules: Players can't draw cards this turn.

Frost Hero Required 
Remove Cold Snap from the game. 
Put up to X Frost ability cards with different names from your graveyard into your hand.

rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 4 fire damage to it.

rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Frost Nova

name: Frostbolt

rules: Ongoing: Pay 1, Destroy Mana Agate >>> Draw two cards.

Attach to target ally.
Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses all powers, and is a Sheep.

Fire Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 6 fire damage to it. 
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 fire damage to attached character.

rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies can't attack heroes or allies in your party unless their controller pays 1 for each attacker.

rules:
Attach to target hero or ally. 
Ongoing: Attached character has +1 ATK while attacking.

Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by attached character.

Attach to target hero or ally. 
Ongoing: Attached character has "[Activate] >>> Draw a card."

Your hero can't be targeted by opponents this turn.

Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
Draw a card.

Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

Protection Hero Required
Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to your hero by target hero or ally this turn. When damage is prevented this way, your hero deals that amount of holy damage to that character.

rules: Ongoing: When a hero or ally in your party is dealt combat damage, it deals 1 holy damage to the source of that combat damage.

Ongoing: Your hero has protector.
When your hero protects, it heals 1 damage from itself.

Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, it heals 2 damage from itself.

Attach to target ally with cost X.

Attach to target hero or ally, and its controller discards a card. 
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.

Shadow Hero Required

Holy Hero Required

Assassination Hero Required

When your hero deals damage to an ally this turn, destroy that ally.

Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached character.

rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

Subtlety Hero Required

Ongoing: Your hero is stealthed. (Can't protect against it. Destroy this card when your hero deals damage.)

Totem (Can be attacked or targeted like an ally.)

For each type of Totem you have, do the following:
Air: Ready your hero and one of your Melee weapons.
Earth: Allies in your party have +1 ATK this turn.
Fire: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
Water: Draw two cards.

Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character. 
When attached character is destroyed, its controller discards a card.

Attach to target hero or ally.

Ongoing: If you would draw a card, choose a card you removed and put it into your hand instead.

Elusive

[Activate] >>> While Helwen remains exhausted, you control target ally.

Demonology Hero Required

name: Charge

Attach to target ally.

rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally.

name: Rescue the Survivors!
rules:
Draenei Hero Required
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put two Draenei Survivor ally tokens into play with 0 ATK, 1 health, and "Exhaust your hero, remove this ally from the game >>> Draw a card."

name: Tundra MacGrann's Stolen Stash
rules:
Dwarf Hero Required
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: If your hero dealt combat damage to an opposing hero this turn, draw two cards.

name: Wanted: "Hogger"
rules:
Human Hero Required
During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target opponent puts a Gnoll ally token named Hogger with 2 ATK and 2 health into play. When Hogger leaves play, draw two cards.

Blood Elf Hero Required
During your turn, remove a non-token ally in your party from the game and pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.

Undead Hero Required
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, draw a card for each ally card you've removed with quests named The Haunted Mills.

name: Hidden Enemies
rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose one: Target ally has ferocity this turn; or draw a card. If your hero is an Orc, you may choose both.

name: Lazy Peons
rules:
Orc Hero Required
Lazy Peons enters play exhausted.
Exhaust Lazy Peons to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: A New Plague
rules:
During your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose one: If an ally is in your party, each player destroys an ally in his party; or draw a card. If your hero is an Undead, you may choose both.

name: Poison Water
rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose one: Shuffle any number of cards from your graveyard into your deck; or draw a card. If your hero is a Tauren, you may do both.

name: Rite of Vision
rules:
Tauren Hero Required
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a Spirit Guide ally token with 1 ATK and 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, remove that ally from the game. If you do, choose a card from your collection, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: Solanian's Belongings
rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose one: Put an ability card from your graveyard on top of your deck; or draw a card. If your hero is a Blood Elf, you may choose both.

name: Test of Faith
rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Discard your hand, then draw a card.

name: Thwarting Kolkar Aggression
rules:
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose one: Target player turns one of his quests face down; or draw a card. If your hero is a Troll, you may choose both.

rules:
Troll Hero Required
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target player discards a card.

name: Alas, Andorhal
rules:
During your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Remove up to three target cards in one graveyard from the game.

name: As the Crow Flies
rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Look at target player's hand.

name: Divino-matic Rod
rules:
If an opponent has more resources than you, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and exhausted.

name: A Donation of Silk
rules:
Pay 2 to compete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

name: The Dying Balance
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. If they have different card types, put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck. Otherwise, put both on the bottom of your deck.

rules:
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put an ally card with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.

name: The Green Hills of Stranglethorn
rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all revealed cards named The Green Hills of Stranglethorn into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Samophlange
rules:
Exhaust one of your equipment and pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed quest card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Ongoing: When your hero attacks, it deals 1 melee damage to target opposing hero.

Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 arcane damage to it.

Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.)

Alliance Hero Required

Ferocity

Your hero deals that much nature damage to target hero or ally, or double that much if the targeted character has a Poison attached to it.

Play only if your hero has stealth.

Assassination Hero Required

Protector

Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector
Inspire: Armor (You may ready one of your armor during each other player's ready step.)

name: Xanata the Lightsworn
rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector
If Xanata would be dealt combat damage while defending, prevent 2 of it.

name: Arcanist Alathana
rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Ability
When Alathana sabotages an ability, put a depletion counter on it.
Abilities with depletion counters lose and can't have powers.

name: Arcanist Atikan
rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Side Deck
When Atikan sabotages a side deck, cards in it can't leave that side deck this match.

name: Arcanist Dayvana
rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Quest
When Dayvana sabotages a quest, you may complete it this turn.

name: Arcanist Lyronia
rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
When Lyronia enters play, look at the top card of target opponent's deck. You may put it on the bottom.

name: Magistrix Dianas
rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
When Dianas enters play, look at the top card of your deck. Either draw it or put it on the bottom. If you draw it, put Dianas from play into her owner's hand.

name: Magistrix Larynna
rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Graveyard
When Larynna sabotages a graveyard, she deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each card in it.

name: Retainer Athan
rules:
Scryer Reputation
When Athan is destroyed, target player discards his hand, then draws that many cards.

name: Retainer Cara
rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Sabotage: Equipment (This ally can attack opposing equipment.)
When Cara sabotages an equipment, gain control of it.

name: Retainer Eteron
rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Hand
When Eteron sabotages an opponent's hand, look at it and choose up to two cards. That opponent puts those cards in his resource row face down and exhausted.

name: Retainer Ryn
rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Player
When Ryn sabotages a player, that player chooses an ability, ally, equipment, or resource he controls and puts it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Retainer Zian
rules:
Scryer Reputation
Stealth
Zian has -1 ATK / -1 health for each protector in play.

name: Spymaster Thalodien
rules:
Scryer Reputation
Sabotage: Deck
When Thalodien sabotages a deck, reveal cards from the top until you reveal a non-quest card. Remove that card from the game and put the rest on the bottom. You may play that card without paying its play cost this turn. If it has X in its play cost, X is 0.)

name: Coilfang Myrmidon
rules:
Traitor Hero Required
When Coilfang Myrmidon is destroyed, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's named Coildfang Myrmidon, draw it.

name: Lady Katrana Prestor
rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Pay 15 >>> Remove all of your cards in all zones from the game and start an Onyxia Raid.

name: Lady Vashj
rules:
Traitor Hero Required
At the end of each turn, roll a die. Put that many Naga ally tokens with 1 Melee ATK / 1 health into play.

name: Millhouse Manastorm
rules:
Millhouse enters play with three monologue counters and can't attack while he has any.
Pay 1, Say "Lowly? Nobody refers to the mighty Millhouse Manastorm as lowly!" >>> Remove a monologue counter.
Pay 2, Say "Ice, Ice, Baby!" >>> Remove a monologue counter.
Pay 3, Say "I'm gonna light you up, sweet cheeks!" >>> Remove a monologue counter.    Use each of these powers only once per game.

name: Pathaleon the Calculator
rules:
Traitor Hero Required
Pay 2, Remove Pathaleon from the game >>> Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw that many cards. You can use this power if Pathaleon is in your hand or party.

name: Prince Kael'thas Sunstrider
rules:
Traitor Hero Required
At the end of your turn, gain control of all ready opposing resources. (Move them to your resource row.)

name: Sunseeker Astromage
rules:
Traitor Hero Required
When another ally named Sunseeker Astromage in your party is destroyed, draw a card.

name: Warlord Kalithresh
rules:
Traitor Hero Required
At the end of your turn, put a Naga Distiller ally token with 0 Melee ATK / 1 health into play.
At the start of your turn, destroy a Naga Distiller in your party.
If you do, Kalithresh has +5 ATK this turn.

name: X-51 Nether-Rocket
rules:
Pay 1, [Activate] >>> Target [Horde] ally in your party has ferocity this turn. At end of turn, destroy it.
Pay 1, [Activate] >>> Target [Alliance] ally in your party can use [Activate] powers this turn. At end of turn, destroy it.

name: Arcanium Signet Bands
rules: [Activate] >>> If target ally would be dealt damage this turn, it's dealt double that much instead.

name: Armwraps of Disdain
rules: Destroy an ability you control >>> your hero has +1 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Azure-Shield of Coldarra
rules: [Activate] >>> If your hero would be dealt damage, prevent all but 3 of it.

name: Barbaric Legstraps
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally. Use only if an opposing ally was destroyed this turn.

name: Doomplate Warhelm
rules: Each of your armor has +3 DEF while you have five or more equipment.

name: Fanblade Pauldrons
rules: Exhaust your hero >>> Fanblade Pauldrons has +4 DEF this turn.

name: Helm of Desolation
rules: When you strike with a weapon, target ally in your party has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Legguards of the Shattered Hand
rules: [Activate] >>> Destroy target ally with damage on it.

name: Mana-Etched Crown
rules: [Activate] >>> Put target ability card from your graveyard into your resource row face down and exhausted. Use only if you have seven or more cards in hand,

name: Mana-Sphere Shoulderguards
rules: When an opponent discards a card, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in that opponent's party.

name: Wastewalker Helm
rules: When your hero deals damage to an exhausted ally, destroy it.

name: Wastewalker Leggings
rules: When an opposing hero or ally becomes exhausted, your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.

name: Choker of Vile Intent
rules: At the start of your turn, you may destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control. If you do, each opponent destroys a card of that kind he controls.

name: Hourglass of the Unraveller
rules: You pay 1 less to play equipment, to a minimum of 1.

name: Quagmirran's Eye
rules: You pay 1 less to play abilities, to a minimum of 1.

name: Ring of the Shadow Deeps
rules: [Activate], Destroy an ally in your party >>> Your hero has +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Ring of the Silver Hand
rules: [Activate], >>> Prevent all combat damage that target attacking ally would deal to your hero this combat.

name: Blade of Wizardry
rules: Pay 1 , [Activate], Discard an ability card >>> Destroy target ally.

name: Bloodskull Destroyer
rules: Pay 1, Destroy Bloodskull Destroyer Destroy >>> target ally with protector.

name: Essence Gatherer
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, you may pay 1. If you do, draw a card.

name: Plasma Rat's Hyper-Scythe
rules: Exhaust one of your armor or weapons >>> Ready one of your resources.

name: Quantum Blade
rules: Remove the top ten cards of your deck from the game >>> You pay 5 less the next time you strike with Quantum Blade this turn.

name: Reflex Blades
rules: When you play an armor or weapon, ready Reflex Blades and your hero.

name: Terokk's Shadowstaff
rules: Pay 2, Destroy Terokk's Shadowstaff >>> Target opponent chooses an ally in his party, and you gain control of it. and you take control of that ally.

name: Vileblade of the Betrayer
rules: You may remove a Poison card in hand from the game rather than pay Vileblade of the Betrayer's cost.

name: Voidfire Wand
rules: When combat damage is dealt with Voidfire Wand to a hero, the next time that hero's controller would draw a card, he skips drawing it instead.

name: Wand of the Seer
rules: When your hero deals damage with an ability to a hero, it also deals that much nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target allies.

name: Wrathtide Longbow
rules:
When you strike with Wrathtide Longbow, your hero has long-range this combat.
When an opposing ally enters play, your hero deals 1 ranged damage to it.

name: Marks of Kil'jaeden
rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
If an ally with inspire is in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.  
Reward: Draw a card.

name: Sunfury Briefings
rules:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Ready an ally in your party.

name: Firewing Signets
rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
If an ally with sabotage is in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: Manaforge B'naar
rules:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Exhaust target ally.

name: Deep Sea Salvage
rules:
During your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a card from your graveyard on top of your deck.

name: Dr. Boom!
rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck, put damage on your hero equal to its cost, then put it into hand.

Remove any number of ally cards in your graveyard from the game and pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each three ally cards removed this way.

name: Information Gathering
rules:
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into hand, one on top of your deck, and the other on the bottom.

name: Kim'jael Indeed!
rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with the same name as a card in play you control intro your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Leader of the Darkcrest
rules:
If an ally with cost 5 or more is in your party, pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards.

name: Meeting with the Master
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each five resources you have.

name: Needs More Cowbell
rules:
During your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a unique Ghost Cow ally token named Bessy into play with 1 Melee ATK / 1 health and "At the start of your turn, remove this ally from the game. If you do, you may remove target ally from the game."

name: Orders From Lady Vashj
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you have no cards in hand, draw two cards.

name: Potential Energy Source
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: You pay 4 less to complete your next quest this turn.

name: Preparing for War
rules:
Pay X to complete this quest.
Reward: Shuffle X target cards from any number of graveyards into their owners' decks.

name: Shutting Down Manaforge Ara
rules:
If an equipment was destroy this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Sigil of Krasus
rules:
If an opponent played an ally this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Unending Invasion
rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, then draw another one for each 10 damage on your hero.

name: A Warm Welcome

If your hero has dealt 5 or more damage this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.

name: You, Robot
rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Equipment card in your hand are instant this turn.

rules: Pay 1, Flip Black Ice >>> Black Ice deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

rules: Pay 2, Flip Blaine >>> Destroy target armor or item.

rules: Pay 1, Flip Durga, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game >>> Destroy target ally if its cost is less than or equal to the number of cards removed this way.

rules: Pay 1, Flip Elumeria >>> Elumeria heals all damage from all of your Pets.

name: Eriun Moonglow
rules: Pay X, Flip Eriun, shuffle X Balance ability cards from your graveyard into your deck >>> Eriun deals X nature damage to target ally. Use only on your turn.

rules: Pay 4, Flip Kamboozle, put 2 damage on her >>> Draw two cards.

name: Marta Spires
rules: Pay 6, Flip Marta >>> Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have. Use only on your turn.

name: Vakeron
rules: Pay 7, Flip Vakeron >>> Vakeron deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Zaritha
rules: Pay 2, Flip Zaritha >>> Zaritha heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Grindel Hellbringer
rules: Pay 3, Flip Grindel >>> Grindel deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Joren the Martyr
rules: Pay 2, Flip Joren >>> The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

rules: Pay 2, Flip Koth >>> Allies in your party have +1 ATK while in combat with target hero or ally this turn.

name: Phosphus the Everburning
rules: Pay 4, Flip Phosphus >>> Choose one: Phosphus deals 4 fire damage to target ally; or Phosphus deals 2 fire damage to each of two target allies.  Use only on your turn.

name: Ravenna
rules: Flip Ravenna >>> Target ally in your party has stealth this turn.

name: Ringleader Kuma
rules: Pay 4, Flip Kuma >>> Heroes and allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking heroes this turn.

name: Tahanu Brinkrunner
rules: Pay 4, Flip Tahanu >>> Put target ally card from your graveyard into hand.

name: Valterus
rules: Pay 3, Flip Valterus >>> Target friendly hero or ally is untargetable this turn.

name: Warmaster Bo'jo
rules: Pay 2, Flip Bo'jo >>> Bo'jo has +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Kurzon the False
rules:
FRONT: Pay 1, Put three [Alliance] allies from your party into their owners' hands >>> Flip Kurzon face down.
BACK: [Alliance] allies in your party are elusive.

name: Famish the Binder
rules:
FRONT: Pay 3, Destroy three [Horde] allies in your party >>> Flip Famish face down.
BACK: [Horde] allies in your party have ferocity.

name: Imp Lord Pinprik
rules:
FRONT: Elusive
BACK: Elusive
Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any abilities that deal fire damage, and any [Fire] allies. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

name: Mother Misery
rules:
FRONT: Sextuple Wield (Can have up to six hands of Melee weapons and strike with any number of them during the same combat.)
BACK: Sextuple Wield (Can have up to six hands of Melee weapons and strike with any number of them during the same combat.)
Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests and any Melee weapons. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

name: Obliveron
rules:
FRONT: You can have any number of Pets.
BACK: You can have any number of Pets.
Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any Traitor cards, and any Demon allies. You can't include cards with reputation or other text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

name: Xia, Queen of Suffering
rules:
FRONT: Flip Xia >>> Gain control of target ally. Use only on your turn.
BACK: 
Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any [Warlock] abilities, and any [Warlock] allies with ally type Warlock. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

name: Brace or Mace
rules:
Choose one: Your hero heals 4 damage from target hero; or attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK / +1 health.

name: Energize
rules: Target player draws two cards.

name: Feral Energy
rules: Ongoing: While in cat form, when your hero deals combat damage to a defending hero, you may pay 1 . If you do, its controller discards a card.

name: Ferociousness
rules:
Ongoing: When your hero protects, draw a card.
Your hero is in bear form. (Is a protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Furor
rules:
Restoration Hero Required
Ongoing: When you play a Form, you may ready up to X of your resources, where X is its cost.

name: Insect Swarm
rules:
Balance Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 nature damage to it.
Ongoing: Attached character has -2 ATK.

name: Rebirth
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Rotten to the Spore
rules:
Exhaust any number of target allies in target opponent's party.
Ongoing: Each of them can't ready during its controller's ready step.

name: Stormfire
rules:
Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
Draw a card.

name: Typhoon
rules:
Ongoing: Typhoon enters play with two wind counters.
Opposing heroes and allies can't attack or protect.
At the start of your turn, remove a wind counter. If none remain, destroy Typhoon.

name: Bait the Trap
rules: Ongoing: Trap cards in your hand also have "You may exhaust a defending ally in your party rather than pay this card's cost."

name: The Beast Within
rules:
Beast Mastery Hero Required
While you have a Pet this turn, prevent all damage that your hero would be dealt, and your hero has +3 ATK.

name: Ice Trap
rules:
Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.)
Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target attacker. Remove a character dealt damage this way from combat.

name: Patient Shot
rules: Ongoing: You're hero has "[Activate] >>> This hero deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally."

name: Shadow
rules:
Elusive
(Can't be attacked.)

name: Stable Master
rules: Ongoing: You can have an additional Pet.

name: Trueshot Aura
rules:
Marksmanship Hero Required
Ongoing: Ranged allies in your party have +2 ATK while attacking.
Your Ranged weapons have +2 ATK while your hero is attacking.
If your hero would deal ranged damage with an ability, it deals that much +2 instead.

name: Viper Sting
rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of attached hero's controller's turn, he exhausts one of his resources, or two if you have a Ranged weapon.

name: Webster
rules:
At the end of your turn, you may put a web counter on target ally.
Allies with a web counter can't attack.
When Webster leaves play, remove all web counters from opposing allies.

name: Wipe or Snipe
rules:
Choose one: Your hero deals 1 ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies; or attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has long-range.

name: Arcane Research
rules:
You pay 1 less to play Arcane Research for each other card named Arcane Research in your graveyard.
Draw two cards.

name: Astral Grief
rules: Interrupt target quest reward effect.

name: Blast Wave
rules:
Fire Hero Required
Your hero deals 2 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't protect this turn.

name: Brain Lock
rules:
Ongoing: Brain Lock enters play with two frost counters.
If an opponent would draw a card, he skips drawing that card and you remove a frost counter instead. If none remain, destroy Brain Lock.

name: Flickers from the Past
rules: Put any number of target ongoing ability cards from your graveyard into play if their combined cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Mage Armor
rules: Ongoing: Pay 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game >>> Prevent the next 2 damage that your hero would be dealt this turn.Pay

name: The More, the Scarier
rules: Your hero deals X fire damage to each of X target allies.

name: Smoke or Croak
rules:
Choose one: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero; or attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is a Frog.

name: Supernova
rules:
As an additional cost to play, destroy all of your resources.
Your hero deals fire damage to target hero equal to the number of resources destroyed this way.

name: Water Elemental
rules:
Frost Hero Required
[Activate] >>> Water Elemental deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Blessing of Salvation
rules:
Ongoing: When Blessing of Salvation enters play, choose a friendly player.
That player is untargetable.

name: Blessing of Sanctuary
rules:
Protection Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Prevent all combat damage that attached character would be dealt. When damage that an attacking ally would deal is prevented this way, destroy that ally.
At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Sanctuary.

name: Crusader's Sweep
rules: Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Divine Plea
rules:
If you control an Aura, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.
If you control a Blessing, draw two cards.
If you control a Seal, ready your hero and all of your weapons.

name: Exemplar's Shield
rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +X health, where X is the highest DEF among your armor.

name: Full Circle
rules: You may discard an ally card. If you do, put a second target ally card from your graveyard into play, then put a third target ally from your party into its owner's hand.

name: Holy Shock
rules:
Holy Hero Required
Prevent the next 4 damage that target friendly hero or ally would be dealt this turn.
Your hero deals 4 unpreventable holy damage to target opposing hero or ally.

name: Righteousness Aura
rules: Ongoing: If a hero or ally in your party would deal damage, it deals that much +1 instead.

name: Seal of Retribution
rules:
Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, you may destroy target ally that attacked this turn.
Pay 1, Destroy Deal of Retribution >>> Destroy target ally that attacked this turn.

name: Shield or Wield
rules:
Choose one: Prevent the next 3 damage that target ally would be dealt this turn; or attach to target hero.
Ongoing: Attached hero has +1 ATK while attacking.

name: Circle of Healing
rules:
Holy Hero Required
Your hero heals 10 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Divine Spirit
rules:
Discipline Hero Required
Ongoing: [Activate] >>> Draw a card, or ready up to three of your resources.

name: Equal Opportunity
rules: Each player puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand.

name: Faces from the Past
rules: Put any number of target ally cards from your graveyard into play if their combined cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Lesser Heal
rules: Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Levitate
rules: Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, that opponent chooses an ally in his party. That ally can't attack this turn.

name: Mana Burst
rules: Ready all of target opponent's exhausted resources. Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to his hero for each resource readied this way.

name: Mindflip
rules: You may choose an ally in your party and have target player gain control of it. If you do, gain control of target ally in his party.

name: Shadow Word: Agony
rules:
Attach to target hero.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, attached hero's controller discards a card.

name: Woe or Grow
rules:
Choese one: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally; or attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 health.

name: Dirty Work
rules: Ongoing: If your hero would deal non-combat damage, it deals combat damage instead.

name: Disassemble

name: Feint
rules: Remove target attacker from combat.

name: Fight or Blight
rules:
Choose one: Target hero has stealth this turn; or attach to target hero or ally that your hero dealt combat damage to this turn.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character.

name: Knock Out
rules: Destroy target quest.

name: Massacre
rules:
As an additional cost to play, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game.
Destroy X target exhausted allies, where X is the number of cards removed this way.

name: Overkill
rules:
As an additional cost to play, remov up to five Finishing Move cards from your graveyard from the game.
Each opponent destroys that many of his equipment and discards that many cards, and your hero deals that much melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Sap
rules:
Attach to target hero or ally and exhaust it.
Ongoing: Attached character can't ready during its controller's ready step.
When attached character is dealt damage, destroy Sap.

name: Shadowstep
rules:
Subtlety Hero Required
Ongoing: Ready opposing heroes and allies also count as being exhausted. (They are still ready.)

name: Vigor
rules:
Assassination Hero Required
Put Vigor into your resource row face down and ready.

name: Crackling Purge
rules: Destroy target ability. If it wasn't attached to a friendly hero or ally, your hero may deal nature damage to its controller's hero equal to its cost.

name: Exemplar's Blades
rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Attached ally has +X ATK, where X is the highest ATK among your Melee weapons.

rules: Look at the top five cards of your deck. Choose one, shuffle the rest into your deck, then put that card on top.

name: Gifts from the Past
rules: Put any number of target equipment cards from your graveyard into play if their combined cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Lightning Arc
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.

name: Magma Totem
rules:
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, Magma Totem deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Mend or End

Choose one: Your hero heals 5 damage from target ally; or attach to one of your Melee weapons.
Ongoing: Attached weapon has +2 ATK.

rules:
As an additional cost to play, destroy an ally in your party.
Search your deck for a card with the same name as that ally and put it into play.

name: Spirit Weapons
rules:
Enhancement Hero Required
Ongoing: [Activate] >>> Target hero or ally has -X ATK this turn, where X is the combined ATK of your Melee weapons.

name: Totemic Mastery
rules:
Restoration Hero Required

name: Aftermath
rules:
Destruction Hero Required
Ongoing: When you play an ability, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

name: Clinging Curse
rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Untargetable
At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.

name: Crush Soul
rules: Interrupt target ally card. If you do, remove it from the game and put damage on your hero equal to that card's ATK.

name: Curse of Exhaustion
rules:
Affliction Hero Required
Target player skips his next turn.

name: Demon Armor
rules: Ongoing: Pay 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game >>> Your hero heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Enslave Demon
rules:
Attach to target Demon ally.
Ongoing: You control attached ally.

name: Rain or Pain
rules:
Choose one: At the end of this turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally; or attach to target ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 shadow damage to attached ally.

name: Sarlia
rules:
Untargetable
Pay 1 >>> Other allies in your party are elusive this turn.

name: Velnoth
rules:
Velnoth can protect your hero.

rules:
Shadow Hero Required
Ongoing: Pay X, [Activate] >>> Target player puts the top X cards of his deck into his graveyard.

name: Precognition
rules: Target opponent reveals his hand and chooses an ally card in it with cost X or less. Put that card into your party.

name: Shadow Word: Anguish
rules: Your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target ally and 5 shadow damage to itself.

name: Sublimate
rules: Put each opposing ability and equipment into its owner's hand.

name: Vampiric Tendrils
rules: Target player discards two cards. Your hero heals damage from itself equal to the combined cost of those cards.

name: Deathblow
rules:
Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
Your hero deals 1 plus X melee damage to target hero or ally.

name: Detect Traps
rules: Choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment," and then target player reveals his hand and discards all cards of that kind.

name: Gang Up
rules:
As an additional cost to play, exhaust two heroes and/or allies in your party.
Destroy target ally.

name: Nerves of Steel
rules:
Combat Hero Required
Ready your hero. It can't be exhausted by opposing cards and effects this turn.

name: Pernicious Poison
rules:
Attach to target hero or ally that your hero dealt combat damage to this turn.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 nature damage to attached character.

name: Ransack
rules: Destroy the card with the lowest cost among abilities, allies, and equipment in play. If two or more are tied, destroy all with that cost.

name: Slay the Feeble
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.

name: Surge of Adrenaline
rules:
Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
You pay X less to play Surge of Adrenaline.
Draw three cards.

name: Energized
rules: Ready target ally.

name: Greater Chain Lightning
rules:
Target up to five heroes and/or allies.
Your hero deals 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

name: Grounding Totem
rules:
Ongoing: Opposing cards and effects must target Grounding Totem if able.
(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Lightning Overload
rules:
Elemental Hero Required
Ongoing: When you play a non-ongoing ability, destroy Lightning Overload. If you do, copy that ability. 
(You may choose new targets for the copy.)

name: Natural Conduit
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target ally and heals 3 damage from itself.

name: Primal Totem
rules:
Ongoing: When one of your Totems is destroyed, it deals 1 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally.
(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Water Breathing
rules: Ongoing: You may complete quest cards from your hand. As you do, remove them from the game as an additional cost.

name: Winterstorm Totem
rules:
Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, Winterstorm Totem deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally in that opponent's party. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Curse of Fatigue
rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a fatigue counter on Curse of Fatigue.
Attached character has -1 health for each fatugue counter.

name: Drain Will
rules: Target player discards a card and you draw a card.

name: Enslaved Abyssal
rules:
Fire Resistance
At the end of your turn, if you didn't play a Demon or Demonology card this turn, choose an opponent. He gains control of Enslaved Abyssal, and it loses this power.

name: Gakmat
rules:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
Pay X, [Activate] >>> Gakmat deals X fire damage to target ally and itself.

name: Rain of Shadow
rules: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally. When a character dealt damage this way is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.

name: Suspended Curse
rules:
Attach to target ability, ally, or equipment.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, remove attached card from the game.

name: Unending Breath
rules:
Ongoing: Play with the top card of your deck revealed.
You may complete quest cards from the top of your deck. As you do, remove them from the game as an additional cost.

name: Unholy Power
rules:
Demonology Hero Required
Demons in your party have +3 ATK / +3 health.

name: Absolute Poise
rules: Interrupt target ability or equipment card.

name: Battle Tactics
rules:
Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies must attack each turn if able.
When an opponent proposes a combat, you may change the proposed defender. (It must be a legal choice for the attacker.)

name: Behead
rules: If target ally is damaged, destroy it. Otherwise, your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.

name: Enduring Shout
rules: Ongoing: While exactly one ally is in your party, it has +2 ATK / +2 health and is a protector.

name: Menace
rules: Put target ally on top of its owner's deck

name: Taunt
rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: Attached character must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.

name: War of Attrition
rules: Put any amount of damage divided as you choose on allies in your party. Each opponent divides that much damage among allies in his party. Players can't put more than fatal damage on an ally this way.

name: Weapon Mastery
rules:
Fury Hero Required
Ongoing: When you play a Melee weapon, put a strength counter on Weapon Mastery.
Your Melee weapons have +1 ATK for each strength counter.

name: Arcane Spikes
rules: Your hero deals X arcane damage to target ally.

name: Bloody Ritual
rules:
As an additional cost to play, put 4 damage on your hero.
Draw four cards.

name: Courageous Defense
rules:
Draw a card.
Ongoing: Your hero is a protector.

name: Creeping Shadow
rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character.

name: Demolish
rules: Destroy target equipment.

name: Eagle Sight
rules: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one into hand and the other on the bottom of your deck.

name: Engulfing Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to each hero and ally.

name: Fire and Ice
rules: Your hero may deal 2 fire damage to target hero or ally, and it may deal 1 frost damage to a second target hero or ally. A character dealt frost damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Immobilize
rules:
Attach to target ability, ally, equipment, or resource and exhaust it.
Ongoing: Attached card can't ready during its controller's ready step.

name: Lose Control
rules: Target player discards a random card.

name: Natural Disaster
rules: Your hero deals 6 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Nature Unleashed
rules: Put five bear Ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and protector.

name: Revitalize
rules:
Attach to target hero or ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 2 damage from attached character.

name: Revival Stone
rules:
Attach to target ally in your party.
Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, put it from its owner's graveyard into your party with damage equal to its health minus 1.

name: Spell Ricochet
rules: You may change the target of an ability card with a single target.

name: Sphere of Divinity
rules:
Attach to target ally.
Ongoing: Prevent all damage that attached ally would be dealt.
At the start of the turn, destroy Sphere of Divinity.

name: Thud!
rules: Exhaust target card in play. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Topple
rules: Destroy target ally attacking your hero.

name: Owned!
rules: Remove target ally from the game. Search its owner's deck, graveyard, hand, and party for all ally cards with the same name as that ally and remove them from the game.

name: Pandamonium!
rules: Put three Pandaren ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and "This token has +1 ATK / +1 health for each other Pandaren in your party."

name: Slashdance
rules: Each player may dance the way he imagines his hero would dance. If he does, he may turn his hero face up.

name: Al'lanora
rules:
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)
[Activate] >>> Interrupt target card unless its controller pays 1.

name: Anguar Frostbeard
rules: Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost or [Frost] damage that this ally would be dealt.

name: Braeden Nightblade
rules:
Protector
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)

name: Brelnor Mindbender
rules: When Brelnor enters play, gain control of target ally while Brelnor remains in your party.

name: Catarina Clark
rules:
Protector
[Activate] >>> Catarina heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Chief Researcher Kartos
rules: When you complete your first quest each turn, you may ready all resources exhausted to complete it.

name: Consul Rhys Lorgrand
rules:
Human Hero Required
Diplomacy: [Alliance] allies
Rhys has +1 ATK / +1 health for each different [Alliance] race among allies in your party other than Human. (Draenei, Dwarf, Gnome, and Night Elf)

name: Cymbre Shadowdrifter
rules: Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable when ready.)

name: Daniel Soortan
rules:
Diplomacy: Dwarves (You pay 1 less to play Dwarf allies, to a minimum of 1.)
[Activate] >>> Target player puts the top two cards of his deck into his graveyard.

name: Durgrin Ironedge
rules: When Durgrin enters play, you may exhaust target equipment. That Equipment can't ready during its controller's ready step while Durgrin remains in your party.

name: Elementalist Psyrin
rules:
Psyrin can't attack.
[Activate] >>> Target ally has +3 ATK this turn.

name: Envoy Aiden LeNoir
rules:
Diplomacy: Gnomes (You pay 1 less to play Gnome allies, to a minimum of 1.)
Pay 1, [Activate] >>> Draw a card.

name: Envoy Samantha Dillon
rules:
Diplomacy: Night Elves (You pay 1 less to play Night Elf allies, to a minimum of 1.)
[Activate] >>> Ready another target ally in your party. It can't attack this turn.

name: Errzig Cogflicker
rules: Arcane Resistance (Prevent all arcane or [Arcane] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Falcore
rules:
Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)

name: Gryth Thurden, Gryphon Master
rules:
Gryth has +1 ATK / +1 health while you have a location.
[Activate] >>> Ready target location.

name: The Hammerhand Brothers
rules: When The Hammerhead Brothers enters play, target opposing ally can't attack while The Hammerhead Brothers remains in your party.

name: Helena Demonfire
rules:
Diplomacy: Demons (You pay 1 less to play Demon allies, to a minimum of 1)
Opposing heroes and allies have -1 ATK / -1 health for each Demon in your party.

name: High Tinker Mekkatorque
rules: At the start and end of your turn, draw a card for each Gnome in your party.

name: Keward Rocksalt
rules:
Protector
Opposing allies have -1 health while Keward is defending.

name: Kinivus
rules: Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Lanthus of the Forest
rules:
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)
[Activate] >>> Exhaust target ally.

name: Lolly the Unsuspecting
rules: All targets are chosen at random.

name: Loraala
rules:
Loraala can't attack.
[Activate] >>> Loraala deals 3 fire damage to target hero.

name: Magnus Longbarrel
rules: Pay 1, Destroy Magnus >>> Turn target resource face down.

name: Meganna Callaghan
rules: Meganna can attack elusive heroes and allies.

name: Mollie Brightheart
rules:
Diplomacy: Draenei (You pay 1 less to play Draenei allies, to a minimum of 1.)
[Activate] >>> Mollie deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Ninoo of the Light
rules:
Ninoo can't attack.
[Activate] >>> Ninoo heals 1 damage from each hero and ally in your party.

name: Rayne Savageboon
rules:
Protector
Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature or [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Ryno the Short
rules:
When Ryno enters play, put a Felhunter Demon ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.
Pay 1, Destroy a Demon in your party >>> Interrupt target ability card.

name: Swordsmith Hanso
rules:
Protector
Your weapons have +3 ATK.
Opposing weapons have -3 ATK

name: Tinker Art Seaclock
rules:
Art has long-range while he's undamaged.
(Defenders deal no combat damage to him.)

name: Tinker Bixy Blue
rules: If Bixy is undamaged: [Activate] >>> Target player discards a card and you draw a card.

name: Tinker Burnfizzle
rules: If Burnfizzle is undamaged: [Activate] >>> Burnfizzle deals 3 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Tinker Casey Springlock
rules: Casey is a protector while she's undamaged.

name: Tonks the Tenacious
rules: Destroy Tonks >>> Target hero or ally can't attack this turn.

name: Treewarden Tolven
rules:
Protector
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)

name: Tully Fiddlewit
rules: When Tully defends against an ally, discard a card.

name: Virkaltor
rules: Pay 1, Destroy Virkaltor >>> Destroy target ability.

name: Weldon Barov
rules: At the end of your turn, put three Peasant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and protector. At the end of the next turn, destroy them.

name: Woodsie Leafsong
rules:
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)
When Woodsie deals combat damage to an opponent's defending hero, you may destroy target ability or equipment he controls.

name: Wyler Surestrike
rules:
Shadowmeld (Elusive and untargetable while ready.)
When Wyler deals combat damage to a defending ally, destroy that ally.

name: Zempre, Grace of Elune
rules:
Night Elf Hero Required
Shadowmeld
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero while Zempre is exhausted.

name: Zophos
rules:
Protector
When Zophos defends, he deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target attacking ally.

name: ALAMO
rules:
OK LISSEN, UDDER FRENDLY DURIDS HAF +1 FITE / +1 HEELTH.
(Alamo is a Druid. Other friendly Druids have +1 ATK / +1 health.)

name: Alexi Barov
rules: At the start of your turn, put three Peasant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and ferocity. At the end of the next turn, destroy them.

name: Boum Headshot
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
rules:
Protector
Other Tauren in your party have +10 health.

name: Centurion Addisyn
rules:
Protector
As Addisyn enters play, choose arcane, fire, frost, nature, or shadow.
Addisyn has the chosen resistance.

name: Chief Researcher Amereldine
rules: When you complete your first quest each turn, you may turn it face up if it's in play.

name: Cromarius Blackfist
rules: When Cromarius enters play, destroy target opposing ability if its controller has more abilities than you.

name: Darbun Steppeheart
rules:
Protector
War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)

name: Defender Kaniya
rules:
Protector
Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature or [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Doomsayer Din'ju
rules: When Din'ju enters play, turn all opposing resources face down.

name: Elizabeth Crowley
rules: Pay 2, Discard a card >>> Elizabeth heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Erindae Firestrider
rules: Once per turn: Pay 1 >>> Interrupt target card unless its controller pays 1.

name: Gatlin Clouds-the-Sky
rules: Gatlin has long-range while attacking exhausted heroes and allies. (Defenders deal no combat damage to him.)

name: Geoffrey Kimble
rules:
Protector
Pay 3, Discard a card >>> Destroy target ability or equipment.

name: Himul Longstrider
rules: War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)

name: Horkin Figluster
rules:
War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)
When Horkin enters play, exhaust all opposing heroes and allies.

name: Jack Coor
rules: Pay 1, Discard a card >>> Jack deals 1 fire damage to each ally.

name: Jee'zee
rules:
Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)

name: Jil'ti
rules:
Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
Pay 1 >>> Jil'ti has long-range this turn. 
(Defenders deal no combat damage to her.)

name: Johnny Rotten
rules:
When Johnny enters play, he may deal 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Kileana Darkblaze
rules: When Kileana enters play, she deals 2 fire damage to your hero and each other ally in your party.

name: Kirga Earthguard
rules:
Protector
At the end of your turn, ready Kirga.

name: Kray'zin Firetusk
rules:
Troll Hero Required
Berserking
When Kray'zin or another ally enters your party, you may put any amount of non-fatal damage on it.

name: Lifemender Dorn
rules: Once per turn: Pay 1 >>> Dorn heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Logor Blackfist
rules: When Logor enters play, target opponent discards two cards if he has more cards in hand than you.

name: Malicious Mallina
rules:
As Mallina enters play, choose arcane, fire, frost, nature, or shadow.
Mallina has the chosen resistance.

name: Michael Garrett, Bat Handler
rules:
When Michael enters play, reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed location card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
Michael has +1 ATK / +1 health while you have a location.

name: Mistress Naila Flameburst
rules: When Naila attacks, she deals 1 fire damage to each other hero and ally.

name: Mortok
rules: Mortok can attack only exhausted heroes and allies.

name: Munkin Blackfist
rules:
Protector
When Munkin enters play, destroy target equipment if its controller has more equipment than you.

name: Nok'tal the Savage
rules:
Protector
Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)

name: Orion
rules: Protector

name: Quakelord Razek Warhoof
rules:
Tauren Hero Required
War Stomp
When Razek attacks or defends, target opponent exhausts each ability and equipment he controls.

name: Rensarth Shadowsun
rules: On your turn: Pay 1, Put 1 damage on another ally in your party >>> Target ally has -1 health this turn.

name: Roktar Blackfist
rules: When Roktar enters play, destroy target resource if its controller has more resources than you.

name: Rula Blackfist
rules: When Rula enters play, remove target ally from the game if its controller has more allies than you.

name: Sanva
rules: War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)

name: Sarn Earthtrembler
rules:
Protector
War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)
You pay 1 less to play Sarn for each exhausted opposing hero and ally.

name: Sepirion
rules:
Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage)
When Sapirion attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready him.

name: Skumm Bag'go
rules: When Skumm enters play, you may turn target resource face down.

name: Sorga the Swift
rules:
Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
War Stomp (When this ally attack or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)

name: Tormentor Emek
rules: On your turn: Pay 3, Discard a card >>> Target player discards a card.

name: Zari'zari
rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)

name: Zi'mo
rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)

name: Dagg'um Ty'gor
rules: Conspicuous (An opposing hero or ally may protect against this ally.)

name: The Red Bearon
rules: The Red Bearon has +X ATK / +X health, where X is the combined DEF of your armor.

name: Vixton Pinchwhistle
rules:
[Activate] >>> Reveal the top three cards of your deck.
Put a revealed Arena card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Amani Mask of Death
rules: At the end of each turn, destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment with the same name as another card in play.

name: Blue Suede Shoes
rules: When Blue Suede Shoes enters play, target card in play you control is untargetable this turn.

name: Boots of the Resilient
rules: When your hero is dealt damage, exhaust Boots of the Resilient.

name: Cloak of Subjugated Power
rules: On your turn: Pay 1, [Activate], Destroy an ally in your party with cost X >>> Gain control of target ally with cost less than X.

name: Forest Stalker's Bracers
rules: Pay 1 >>> Target hero or ally has stealth this turn. (Can't protect against it.)

name: Girdle of the Blasted Reaches
rules: When Girdle of the Blasted Reaches enters play, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom.

name: Gladiator's Regalia
type_tags: Arena Armor Set Cloth Chest (1) Hands (1) Head (1) Legs (1) Shoulder (1)
rules:
Opposing allies lose and can't have powers.
[Activate] >>> Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Masquerade Gown
rules: [Activate] >>> Target ally in your party becomes a copy of a second target ally in your party this turn.

name: Merciless Gladiator's Battlegear
type_tags: Arena Armor Set Plate Chest (1) Hands (1) Head (1) Legs (1) Shoulder (1)
rules:
If your hero would deal damage with a weapon, it deals double that much instead.
[Activate] >>> Exhaust target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.

name: Mok'Nathal Wildercloak
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, put a +1 DEF counter on Mok'Nathal Wildercloak.

name: Nyn'jah's Tabi Boots
rules:
Other players can't use payment (>>>) powers during your turn.
You can use the payment powers of any cards in play during your turn (including opposing cards).

name: Scaled Breastplate of Carnage
rules: When an ally deals damage to another ally, destroy both of them.

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Vestments
type_tags: Arena Armor Set Leather Chest (1) Hands (1) Head (1) Legs (1) Shoulder (1)
rules:
When you play a finishing move, you may interrupt target card.
[Activate] >>> Put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and ready.

name: Arcanite Dragonling
rules: Pay 1 >>> Arcanite Dragonling is also an ally with 2 [Melee] ATK / 2 health and protector this turn.

name: Rune of Metamorphosis
rules:
Your Forms aren't destroyed by abilities you play.
(You can still have only one card with Form (1) in play.)

name: Veteran's Pendant
rules: If you win this game, you decide who goes first next game.

name: Medallion of the Alliance
rules: Pay 1, Put Medallion of the Alliance on the bottom of your deck >>> Interrupt target ability card that's targeting your hero if it was played by a [Horde] player. (This item can prevent damage like an armor.)

name: Medallion of the Horde
rules: Pay 1, Put Medallion of the Horde on the bottom of your deck >>> Interrupt target ability card that's targeting your hero if it was played by an [Alliance] player.(This item can prevent damage like an armor.)

name: Black Amnesty
rules:
Your hero has dual wield.
Pay 1, [Activate] >>> If your hero is defending against an ally, remove your hero from combat.

name: Bloodseeker
rules:
When you strike with Bloodseeker, your hero has long-range this combat.
At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Bloodseeker this turn, put 3 damage on your hero.

name: Blue Diamond Witchwand
rules:
When an opponent discards a card, put a +1 ATK counter on Blue Diamond Witchwand.
When damage is dealt with Blue Diamond Witchwand, remove all +1 ATK counters from it.

name: Cold Forged Hammer
rules: You pay 1 less to play Cold Forged Hammer for each [Frost] ally in your party.

name: Continuum Blade
rules: At the start of each player's turn, if he didn't take the last turn, he takes an extra turn after this one.

name: Frostguard
rules:
Allies in your party have frost resistance.
(Prevent all frost or [Frost] damage that those allies would be dealt.)

name: Gladiator's Spellblade
rules:
At the start of your turn, put a spell counter on Gladiator's Spellblade.
If your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +1 for each spell counter instead.

name: Ice Barbed Spear
rules: Each opponent can't draw cards unless he pays 1 for each card.

name: Light's Justice
rules: When a [Holy] ally in your party deals damage, it also heals that much from your hero.

name: Lohn'goron, Bow of the Torn-heart
rules:
When you strike with Lohn'goron, your hero has long-range this combat.
Exhaust an ally in your party >>> It deals 1 ranged damage to target hero.

name: Merciless Gladiator's Greatsword
rules: When Merciless Gladiator's Greatsword enters play or you strike with it, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Netherbane
rules: Cards in play you control can't be removed from the game.

name: The Oathkeeper
rules:
When The Oathkeeper enters play, choose an oath: "I won't play cards;" or "I won't draw cards."
You can't break that oath.

name: The Staff of Twin Worlds
rules: Other cards in play have their printed text a second time. (For example, if a card has the text, "Allies have +1 ATK," treat it as though it says that twice.)

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker
rules: When a resource enters play under your control, put a +1 ATK counter on Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker.

name: Wand of Biting Cold
rules: When Wand of Biting Cold enters play, target hero or ally can't attack this turn.

name: Electrified Dagger
rules: Destroy Electrified Dagger >>> Your hero deals 2 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target [Horde] heroes and/or allies.

name: Glacial Blade
rules: Destroy Glacial Blade >>> Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target [Alliance] hero or ally. If a hero is dealt damage this way, its controller skips drawing his next card this turn.

name: Establishing New Outposts
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Alliance] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: In Defense of Halaa
rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You may choose a counter on target card in play and add another of those counters to it.

name: Order Must Be Restored
rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target opponent chooses an ally in his party. When that ally is destroyed this turn, draw a card.

name: Bolstering Our Defenses
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Horde] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Enemies, Old and New
rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You may remove a counter from target card in play.

name: The Final Message to the Wildhammer
rules:
On your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. Put a Message item token into play with "If your hero would be dealt damage, it's dealt that much +1 instead." At the start of your next turn, remove that item from the game.

name: Arena Master
rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Each player chooses an ally in his party. If you chose the ally with the highest ATK, draw two cards.

name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
rules:
You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each [Nature] ally in your party.
Pay 3 To complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Last Barov
rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if two or more allies have the same name.

name: Oshu'gun Crystal Powder
rules:
If you control a location, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: Outland Sucks!

Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)
When Sivandra enters play, draw a card, then destroy an ally in your party.

name: Zalan Ragewind
rules:
Protector
When an opponent's hero readies, you may pay 1. If you do, destroy target ability or equipment that opponent controls.

rules: [Activate] >>> You pay 2 less the next time you strike with a weapon this turn.

rules:
When you place a resource, you may put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and ready.
[Activate] >>> Attach a Balance ability token with three wind counters to target hero or ally. That ability had "Attached character can't attack or protect. At the start of your turn, remove a wind counter. If none remain, destroy this ability.

At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 melee damage to each hero.
Pay 2 >>> This turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt this way. Any player can use this power.

type_tags: Arena Armor Set Cloth Chest (1) Hands (1) Head (1) Legs (1) Shoulder (1)
rules:
Each hero and ally in your party has +X health, where X is its printed health.
[Activate] >>> Target opponent puts three allies from his party into their owners' hands.

type_tags: Arena Armor Set Mail Chest (1) Hands (1) Head (1) Legs (1) Shoulder (1)
rules:
When combat damage is dealt with one or more of your weapons, ready all your weapons.
[Activate] >>> Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A Character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.

rules: Players pay 2 more to play cards.

rules: [Activate] >>> Reveal the top two cards of your deck, then put them on the bottom. If they have different card types, your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally.

When Bangle of Endless Blessings enters play, put each face-down resource into its owner's hand.

Friendly allies can attack Pinata as though it were an opposing ally.

When you play a card, add an honor counter. If there are six or more on Stormpike Insignia, destroy it.
When Stormpike Insignia is destroyed this way, your hero deals 5 frost damage to target hero or ally.

When you play a card, add an honor counter. If there are six or more on Frostwolf Insignia, destroy it.
When Frostwolf Insignia is destroyed this way, your hero deals 5 frost damage to target hero or ally.

When a hero is dealt damage with Arcanite Steam-Pistol, if its controller went first this game, he destroys one of his resources.

Your hero has dual-wield.
Put 1 damage on an ally in your party >>> You pay 1 less the enxt time you strike with Heartless this turn.

rules: Pay 1, Destroy Heartrazor >>> Target hero can't deal damage this turn.

When you strike with Steelhawk Crossbow, your hero has long-range this combat.
At the start of your turn, exhaust Steelhawk Crossbow unless you pay 1.

rules: When an [Alliance] ally is dealt frost or [Frost] damage, destroy it.

Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You pay 4 less to complete your next quest this turn. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all revealed ability, ally, and equipment cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground counter you control.

If an opponent completed a quest this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.

rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you control a location, draw a card. If you control a quest, draw a card.

rules:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with an even cost of 2 or more into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with an odd cost of 1 or more into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

rules:
When you play a card, add an honor counter.

Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.)

Protector

Attach to target hero.

Shadow Hero Required

Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)

rules:
