name: Uruka the Cutthroat
rules:
When this ally is dealt damage, target opponent reveals his hand.
Death Rattle: You may choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment." If you do, target opponent reveals his hand, and this ally deals 1 melee damage to his hero for each revealed card of that kind.

name: Vuz'din
rules: Opposing Ongoing abilities lose and can't have powers.

name: Zugna, Windseer Apprentice
rules:
Assault 1
When this ally exhausts for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready her.

name: Blazing Hippogryph
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
[Activate] >>> Ready a location you control.
When you place a resource face up, your hero may heal all damage from target Unique ally you control.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Brother Keltan
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, it may deal 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally.

name: Commander Falstaav
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
Once per turn: Pay 2 >>> Target Unique ally has +X ATK this turn, where X is its ATK.

name: Crusade Commander Entari
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
At the end of your turn, this ally deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally for each Unique ally you control.

name: Crusade Engineer Spitzpatrick
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, you may draw a card.

name: Crusader Lord Dalfors
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
If a Unique ally you control would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.

name: Eitrigg
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
Cards everywhere are Unique.

name: Father Gustav
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
You pay 1 less to play Unique allies, to a minimum of 1.

name: Sister Colleen Tulley
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
This ally has Mend 1 for each Unique ally you control.

name: Veteran Crusader Aliocha Segard
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
This ally has +1 / +1 for each other Unique ally you control.

name: Azjol-anak Champion
rules:
Nerubian Reputation
This ally has +3 / +3 while an ability, ally, and equipment are in your graveyard.

name: Aurius
rules: When a friendly Paladin is destroyed, it may deal 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Eris Havenfire
rules: When this or another Priest ally enters play under your control, the next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

name: Keeper Remulos
rules: When a Druid you control deals combat damage to a hero, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally tokens into play.

name: Boots of the Renewed Flight
rules: When this armor prevents damage, you may pay 4. If you do, draw a card.

name: Cloak of the Shadowed Sun
rules:
Your hero has Protector.
[Druid] Hero: Opposing allies have -1 ATK.
[Warrior] Hero: Opposing allies have -1 [Health].

name: Gloves of Token Respect
rules:
On your turn: Pay 2 >>> Put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Spider ally token into play.
[Activate], Destroy this armor >>> Put a copy of target ally token into play.

name: Helm of Vital Protection
rules:
Weapons you control have +1 ATK.
Other armor you control have +1 [Defense].

name: Hood of the Exodus
rules: When an ally you control with Assault deals combat damage to an opponent's hero, he discards a card.

name: Leggings of the Honored
rules: This armor has +4 [Defense] if an ally entered a graveyard this turn.

name: Protective Barricade of the Light
rules:
[Paladin] Hero: This armor has +2 [Defense].
[Shaman] Hero: You pay 2 less to play this armor.

name: Sun-Emblazoned Chestplate
rules: When this armor prevents damage that would be dealt by an attacker, your hero deals that much unpreventable holy damage to that attacker.

name: Sympathy
rules: If an ally you control would be dealt damage, 1 of it is dealt to your hero instead.

name: Upstanding Spaulders
rules: Each player can't ready more than three resources during his ready step.

name: "Gigantique" Bag
rules:
You have no maximum hand size.
[Activate], Pay 1 for each card in your hand >>> Draw a card.

name: Idol of the Shooting Star
rules:
Pay 2, [Activate] >>> Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
When you play an ally, ready this item.

name: Libram of Radiance
rules:
Pay 1, [Activate] >>> Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
When you play a [Paladin] armor, ready this item.

name: Life-Binder's Locket
rules:
[Paladin] Hero: [Activate], Discard a card >>> If a friendly hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent 1 of it.
[Priest] Hero: [Activate], Discard a card >>> The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

name: Platinium Disks of Swiftness
rules: [Activate] >>> You pay 1 less to play your nest ally that shares a class with your hero this turn.

name: Statue Generator
rules:
When this item enters play, remove target ally from the game. If you do, add three marble counters, and that ally's owner puts it into play under his control when this item leaves play.
At the start of your turn, remove a marble counter. If none remain, destroy this item.

name: Angry Dread
rules: When this weapon enters play, you may draw a card.

name: Colossal Skull-Clad Cleaver
rules:
When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a skull counter.
This weapon has Assault 1 for each skull counter.

name: Fading Glow
rules: When combat damage is dealth with this weapon, your hero heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Final Voyage
rules:
When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.
This weapon has Assault 1 for each card in opposing hands.

name: Fist of the Deity
rules:
Your hero has Dual Wield.
When this weapon enters play, it has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Haunting Call
rules:
Pay 2, Exhaust your hero >>> Remove three target cards in one opposing graveyard from the game. Add a spirit counter for each ally removed this way.
At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero for each spirit counter.

name: Life and Death
rules:
When you play an ally, you may draw a card.
When an ally you control leaves play, discard a card.

name: Lifeblade of Belgaristrasz
rules:
Finishing Move: Rogue (To play, remove X Rogues in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
When this weapon enters play, your hero deals X damage to target hero or ally and heals X damage from itself.

name: Nerubian Conqueror
rules:
When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.
If a card would enter an opposing graveyard, remove it from the game instead.

name: Silent Crusader
rules: When an opponent's hero is dealt combat damage with this weapon, exhaust all cards he controls.

name: Spire of Sunset
rules: On your turn: Pay 2, Exhaust your hero >>> Your hero deals fire damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of different classes among heroes and allies you control.

name: Staff of Trickery
rules: Exhaust your hero, discard a card >>> Ready or exhaust target card if it shares a type with the card you discarded.

name: Sword of Justice
rules:
This weapon enters play with a +1 ATK counter for each card in your hand.
Remove a +1 ATK counter >>> Exhaust target ally.

name: Torch of Holy Fire
rules: Pay 1, Exhaust your hero >>> Reveal a random card from your hand. If it's a [Holy] card, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally and heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Wraith Spear
rules: When you strike with this weapon while your hero is defending, it heals 4 damage from itself.

name: No Mere Dream
rules:
On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your resource row face down and exhausted. If it was a location or quest, you may turn it face up.

name: Paladin Training
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target hero or ally you control has Protector this turn. Prevent all damage that it would be dealt while protecting this turn.

name: Ichor of Undeath, The
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Call of the Crusade, The
rules:
Argent Crusade Reputation
For each Unique ally you control, you may pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each 2 paid this way.

name: Apply This Twice Daily
rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
If a hero or ally you controlled healed damage this turn, draw another card.

name: Conversing With the Depths
rules:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each five cards in your graveyard.

name: Cycle of Life
rules:
If an ally entered play and an ally left play this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: I'm Not Dead Yet!
rules:
On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a 1 [Holy] / 1 [Health] Unique Priest ally token named Father Kamaros into play with Mend 4.

name: Light Within the Darkness
rules:
If a hero or ally you controlled dealt holy ([Holy]) damage this turn: Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: No One to Save You
rules:
If your hero was dealt 5 or more damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: On Ruby Wings
rules:
On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a 0 [Fire] / 3 [Health] Wyrmrest Vanquisher ally token into play with Mount (1) and "When you place a resource face up, you may draw a card."

name: Planning for the Future
rules:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

name: Really Big Worm
rules:
Exhaust ten cards you control to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards.

name: Return to Angrathar
rules:
You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each Scourge ally you control.
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: Seeds of the Lashers
rules:
Exhaust seven cards you control to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.

name: Tale of Valor, A
rules:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that card's cost.

name: Wanton Warlord
rules:
Exhaust four cards you control to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: Fordragon Hold
rules:
[Activate] >>> Target [Alliance] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.
If you control an ally with Bolvar in its name: [Activate] >>> [Alliance] heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.

name: Kor'kron Vanguard
rules:
[Activate] >>> Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.
If you control an ally with Saurfang in its name: [Activate] >>> Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 3 this turn.

name: Angrathar the Wrathgate
rules:
When a card enters an opposing graveyard from anywhere, add a rattle counter.
On your turn: Pay 2, [Activate], Remove three rattle counters >>> Put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Scourge ally token into play.
